refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o tan.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 irad = 25 i1 = tan(irad)
print i1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Play Instrument #1 for one second. i 1 0 1 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
